dc_title_s: Freight and Passenger Maintenance Facilities, California, 2013
dc_description_s: This point shapefile represents freight and passenger maintenance facilities in California as of 2013. ). This layer is part of a collection of GIS data created by the California Department of Transportation (Caltrans).This dataset is intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.
